lead_paragraph: Three film production companies including Netflix are interested in making a warts-and-all screen dramatization of Nigel Farage's insurgent Brexit campaign, according to an associate of Farage.
snippet: Three film production companies including Netflix are interested in making a warts-and-all screen dramatization of Nigel Farage's insurgent Brexit campaign, according to an associate of Farage....

headline.main: 'Bad Boys of Brexit' Headed for Screen, Says Farage Associate
headline.print_headline: 'Bad Boys of Brexit' Headed for Screen, Says Farage Associate
